Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at Best Western Hotel Marmorata in Ravello, you'll be on the waterfront and minutes from Roman Villa and Villa Rufolo. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Minori Beach and Oscar Niemeyer Auditorium.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 37 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and plasma televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature bidets and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and a turndown service.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax on the private beach or enjoy other recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool and a spa tub. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare, and wedding services. Guests can get around on the complimentary shuttle, which operates within 2 km.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's beachfront restaurant, where you can enjoy drinks at a bar, take in a pool view, and even dine alfresco (weather permitting). You can also stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Thirsty? Quench your thirst at a bar/lounge, a beach bar, or a poolside bar. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's beachfront restaurant, where you can enjoy drinks at a bar, take in a pool view, and even dine alfresco (weather permitting). You can also stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Thirsty? Quench your thirst at a bar/lounge, a beach bar, or a poolside bar. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

The preferred airport for Best Western Hotel Marmorata is Naples (NAP-Naples Intl.) - 38.4 km / 23.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
